definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: First, this thesis will study how to recognize the double full line.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先对城市道路的双实线识别进行研究。

sentences.english: The solid lines show the power consumption.
The solid lines, which show power consumption, do show a slight difference.
sentences.chinese: 但是，显示电能消耗的实线的确显示出轻微的差异。

sentences.english: These margins often show up as light solid or dashed lines on the screen.
sentences.chinese: 在屏幕上这些边线可能会显示为浅色的实线或虚线。

sentences.english: The solid lines signify that the activity takes place within a finite period.
sentences.chinese: 实线表示有关活动在有限期限内进行。

sentences.english: The solid line on the chart below shows real G.D.P. for each of the four quarters of 2008.
sentences.chinese: 下图的实线显示了2008年四个季度的真实GDP。

sentences.english: Reporting and authority relationship are indicated by solid lines showing superior-subordinate connections.
sentences.chinese: 实线注明了汇报和职权关系，显示了上下级的联系。

sentences.english: A bi-directional association is indicated by a solid line between the two classes.
sentences.chinese: 一个双向关联用两个类间的实线表示。

sentences.english: The solid lines indicate electrical connections and the semi-circles represent superconducting junctions.
sentences.chinese: 图中的实线代表的是电流通路，半圆代表超导连接。

definition: pressure crease/fig. to toil for sb else's benefit/line ball (i.e. on the line)
to go straight/straight forward/fig. to do right
to delineate/to draw a line/to underline
